item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
California Baptist University Logo California Baptist University is a private, Christian university in Riverside, California. Founded in 1950 as California Baptist College, it is affiliated with the California Southern Baptist Convention, an organization affiliated with the Southern Baptist Convention. CBU is accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges. Source
You can download theCBUlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: CBU
item.description: California Baptist University is a private, Christian university in Riverside, California. Founded in 1950 as California Baptist College, it is affiliated with the California Southern Baptist Convention, an organization affiliated with the Southern Baptist Convention. CBU is accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Cornerstone University Logo
Cornerstone University is a private, non-denominational Christian university in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Cornerstone University has undergraduate and graduate programs, two seminaries, and a radio division called Cornerstone University Radio. The university offers 60 academic programs in the arts, sciences, humanities, Bible, teacher education, computers and business and journalism. The university maintains Mission Network News, an evangelical “broadcast ministry”. Students are required to abide by a “Lifestyle Statement” intended to reflect trinitarianism.
You can download theCornerstone Universitylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cornerstone University
item.description: Cornerstone University is a private, non-denominational Christian university in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Cornerstone University has undergraduate and graduate programs, two seminaries, and a radio division called Cornerstone University Radio. The university offers 60 academic programs in the arts, sciences, humanities, Bible, teacher education, computers and business and journalism. The university maintains Mission Network News, an evangelical “broadcast ministry”. Students are required to abide by a “Lifestyle Statement” intended to reflect trinitarianism.
